sections: The Morgan Motor Company was founded in 1909 by H.F.S Morgan and though its technology has advanced, the company's design philosophy has endured the test of time.

of the 1930s, Morgan Motor Company has brought the style into the modern era. With long sweeping body lines, large front grills, and round headlights, styling has remained largely unchanged from the very beginning. Likewise, the manufacturing process has also endured as each of its cars are largely hand built and as unique as a modern car can be. Its craftsmen currently build around 800 specially ordered cars per year by hand, offering an alternative to the modern mass production

specifically for an unnamed buyer. It features aluminum bodywork atop a bonded aluminum chassis and is finished in Mercedes-Benz Beryll Metallic paint. Inside is Yarwood Sahara leather upholstery accented by Ash wood trim. An engine-turned dashboard holds white-face gauges, an air conditioner, and a Sony CD stereo. Other appointments include power windows and a manually operated soft top. Providing modern power and reliability is a 329-horsepower factory rated 4.4-liter BMW V8 mated to a 6-speed manual transmission.
This unique Morgan Aero 8 is said to have been recently serviced and is now listed for sale on Bring a Trailer by Cascio Motors.

is your local dealership that cares. We have been in the Scottsdale area for quite some time now, and we love providing our friends and neighbors with the vehicles that they need. We want you to feel right at home when you come to our dealership, and we will always greet you with a friendly smile. We take the time to make sure that you get everything you need.

is a no pressure dealership. Sit back, relax, and let us do the work. We will find you the perfect vehicle at the perfect price. On this page, you will find all our contact information. Give us a call, send us an email, or stop by and see us in person. We hope to talk to you very soon.
